Pull Request #97: Testlink method to add keywords to testcase
Issue #91: Added build closed_on_date and release_date options into build.
Pull Request #86: added API function to retrieve a testsuite's attachments

Updated dependencies, and ran through OWASP security plugin. CVE-2016-5002 does not affect the API, as it requires a server running it in order to create a DoS attack. The server in our case is PHP, and xmlrpc-common is used for client-side only.
